import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useSpring, animated as a } from "react-spring"; import Portrait from '../../images/portrait.png'; import { Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import './style.css' const pages = [ ({ style }) =>

, ({ style }) =>
Philosophy:
Web apps should be responsive, intuitive, and enjoyable. I love to build apps that feel easy to use and fun to explore, balancing UI/UX with performance. ] export default function IdCard() { const [index, set] = useState(0) const onClick = useCallback(() => set(state => (state + 1) % 2), []) const transitions = useTransition(index, p => p, { from: { opacity: 0, transform: 'translate3d(100%,0,0)' }, enter: { opacity: 1, transform: 'translate3d(0%,0,0)' }, leave: { opacity: 0, transform: 'translate3d(-50%,0,0)' }, }) return (
{transitions.map(({ item, props, key }) => { const Page = pages[item] return })}
) }
